info.title: Enter365
info.description: Indonesian Accounting System API - SAK EMKM Compliant. Provides comprehensive endpoints for managing accounts, contacts, invoices, bills, inventory, projects, and financial reports.

post.summary: Create a revision of a quotation

post.description:
Allows salespeople to pick a specific BOM (e.g., from a variant group)
and auto-generate a quotation with proper pricing.

Options:
- margin_percent: Add margin on top of BOM cost (default: 20%)
- selling_price: Override with direct selling price
- expand_items: true = expand BOM items as quotation lines, false = single line item
post.summary: Create a quotation from a BOM
